page.title: 02Matthew Heaton's Monday
page.content:
I wake up at 8a.m.and then wash my face and brush my teeth.After dressing,I eat my breakfast-a bacon bap.A coach then takes me to Ysgol Hiraddug.
School starts at 8.55a.m.with a service.At 9.05 we begin the day with a Maths lesson until playtime at 10.40.We come in at 10.55 and work on English Comprehension Cards.We have our lunch at 12.00 with a meal from the Cafeteria.Afternoon lessons begin with Welsh followed by English.At 2.10p.m. we have playtime for 15 mins followed by a games period_cricket.I go home on the school bus at 3.07p.m.
When I get home I watch T.V. until tea time.After tea I watch T.V.,have a bath and go to bed at 10.00 p.m.
